meanings.definition: The act of dying; the end of life

meanings.sent3: The cat mourned the deaths of its nine lives.
meanings.sent4: In the game of chess, sacrificing a pawn can lead to the deaths of many pieces.
meanings.sent5: The movie depicted the deaths of the main characters in a heartbreaking scene.
